cobifnirs 0.1.0
  • Reference

Package index

All functions

add_brodmanns()
Add Brodmann's areas to the data
add_markers()
Add markers to NIRS data
apply_baseline_correction()
Apply Local Baseline Correction (Robust)
apply_lowpass()
Apply Lowpass Filter (Zero-Phase)
apply_mbll()
Apply the Modified Beer-Lambert Law to delta oxy values to calculate the concentration changes of HbO and HbR.
apply_smar()
Apply Motion Artifact Correction (Despike & Interpolate)
calculate_glm()
Calculate GLM Betas (with Condition Selection)
create_delta_od()
Create change in optical density values from nirs data
create_regressor()
Create Design Matrix Regressor
get_canonical_hrf()
Generate Canonical HRF (Double Gamma)
get_event_data()
Epoch Data for Multi-Level Modeling (MLM)
get_ext_values()
Get the extinction coefficients of HbO and HbR at the two wavelengths.
import_nirs()
Import NIRS data
prepare_mlm_data()
Prepare Data for Multi-Level Modeling (MLM)
remove_ambient()
Remove ambient light channel from NIRS data
remove_channels()
Remove channels from NIRS data
signal_plot()
Generate a plot to view the raw signal data from each optode.
signal_summary()
Generate a summary of the signal data to view weak and saturated channels

Developed by Christopher J Wilson.
